## <a name="script-include-boeingben"></a> Script Include: BoeingBEN

### Class: `BoeingBEN`
&nbsp;&nbsp;**BoeingBEN()**


### Constructor
&nbsp;&nbsp;Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**new BoeingBEN()**

### Static
#### `BoeingBEN.DEBUG` = true


### Methods
#### `initialize()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.


#### `getIDP()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns the sys_id of the appropriate IdP definition record.


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `string` : sys_id from the saml2_update1_properties table.
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `*`
#### `ipAddressIsOnBEN()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns true/false based on whether the current user's ip address is on BEN or not


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean`
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `*`
#### `setUserValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Sets a true/false field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD) on the current user's User record based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.


#### `getUserValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Gets a true/false value from the current user's User record field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD).


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Value from the current user's User record.
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `*`
#### `setUserSessionValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Sets a true/false client data property (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_SESSION_VARIABLE) in the current user's session based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.


#### `getUserSessionValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns the client data property value, where the property name is contained in system property boeing.multisso.session_variable_name, from the current user's session.


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Value from a client data property in current user's session.
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `*`
#### `_isIp4InCIDR(cidr)`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Determines if the current user's ip address is within the ip range parameter.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cidr | string | IP address range value in CIDR format.

     <p> | 
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Based on whether current's user's ip address is within ip address range.
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `*`
#### `_ip4ToInt(ip)`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Converts an ip address to an integer.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| ip | string | IP address.

     <p> | 
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `integer`
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `*`
#### `_getBENCIDRRanges()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns an array of BEN ip address ranges


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `Array` : List of ip addresses within BEN. Should be

## <a name="script-include-boeingben"></a> Script Include: BoeingBENdd
take me to [Back to Top](#top_of_doc)

### Class: `BoeingBEN`
&nbsp;&nbsp;**BoeingBEN()**


### Constructor
&nbsp;&nbsp;Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**new BoeingBEN()**

### Static Properties
#### `BoeingBEN.DEBUG` = true


### Method Details
#### `getIDP()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns the sys_id of the appropriate IdP definition record.


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `string` : sys_id from the saml2_update1_properties table.
#### `getUserSessionValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns the client data property value, where the property name is contained in system property boeing.multisso.session_variable_name, from the current user's session.


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Value from a client data property in current user's session.
#### `getUserValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Gets a true/false value from the current user's User record field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD).


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Value from the current user's User record.
#### `initialize()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.


#### `ipAddressIsOnBEN()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns true/false based on whether the current user's ip address is on BEN or not


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean`
#### `setUserSessionValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Sets a true/false client data property (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_SESSION_VARIABLE) in the current user's session based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.


#### `setUserValue()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Sets a true/false field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD) on the current user's User record based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.


#### `_getBENCIDRRanges()`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Returns an array of BEN ip address ranges


&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `Array` : List of ip addresses within BEN. Should be

     one of more CIDR ranges.
#### `_ip4ToInt(ip)`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Converts an ip address to an integer.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| ip | string | IP address.

     <p> | 
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `integer`
#### `_isIp4InCIDR(cidr)`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Determines if the current user's ip address is within the ip range parameter.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cidr | string | IP address range value in CIDR format.

     <p> | 
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns**
* &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Based on whether current's user's ip address is within ip address range.
#### `_log(msg)`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Adds a message to the system log if BoeingBEN.DEBUG is true.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| msg | String | Message to add to the system log. | 
#### `_logError(msg)`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Adds an error message to the system log.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| msg | string | Message to add to system log. | 
#### `_logWarning(msg)`
&nbsp;&nbsp;Adds a warning message to the system log.

&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| msg | string | Message to add to the system log. |

<h4 id="-setuservalue-"><code>setUserValue()</code></h4>

<h4 id="-getuservalue-"><code>getUserValue()</code></h4>

<h4 id="-getusersessionvalue-"><code>getUserSessionValue()</code></h4>

<ul><li>   <code>boolean</code> : Value from a client data property in current user's session.</li><li>   <code>*</code>

</code></pre>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>boolean</code> : Based on whether current's user's ip address is within ip address range.</li><li>   <code>*</code>
<h4 id="-_ip4toint-ip-"><code>_ip4ToInt(ip)</code></h4>
  Converts an ip address to an integer.</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| ip | string | IP address.</p>
<pre><code> <p> | 
</code></pre>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>integer</code></li><li>   <code>*</code>
<h4 id="-_getbencidrranges-"><code>_getBENCIDRRanges()</code></h4>
  Returns an array of BEN ip address ranges</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>
<p>   <code>Array</code> : List of ip addresses within BEN. Should be</p>
<p>one of more CIDR ranges.</p>
</li><li>   <code>*</code>
<h4 id="-_logerror-msg-"><code>_logError(msg)</code></h4>
  Adds an error message to the system log.</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| msg | string | Message to add to system log. |</p>
<h4 id="-_logwarning-msg-"><code>_logWarning(msg)</code></h4>
<p>  Adds a warning message to the system log.</p>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| msg | string | Message to add to the system log. |</p>
<h4 id="-_log-msg-"><code>_log(msg)</code></h4>
<p>  Adds a message to the system log if BoeingBEN.DEBUG is true.</p>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| msg | String | Message to add to the system log. |</p>

<h2 id="-a-name-script-include-testutil-a-script-include-testutil"><a name="script-include-testutil"></a> Script Include: TestUtil</h2>

<h2 id="-a-name-script-include-boeingben-a-script-include-boeingbendd"><a name="script-include-boeingben"></a> Script Include: BoeingBENdd</h2>
<p>take me to <a href="#top_of_doc" rel="nofollow">Back to Top</a></p>
<h3 id="class-boeingben-">Class: <code>BoeingBEN</code></h3>
<p>  <strong>BoeingBEN()</strong></p>
<h3 id="constructor">Constructor</h3>
<p>  Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.</p>
<p>  <strong>new BoeingBEN()</strong></p>
<h3 id="static-properties">Static Properties</h3>
<h4 id="-boeingben-debug-true"><code>BoeingBEN.DEBUG</code> = true</h4>
<h3 id="method-details">Method Details</h3>
<h4 id="-getidp-"><code>getIDP()</code></h4>
<p>  Returns the sys_id of the appropriate IdP definition record.</p>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>string</code> : sys_id from the saml2_update1_properties table.
<h4 id="-getusersessionvalue-"><code>getUserSessionValue()</code></h4>
  Returns the client data property value, where the property name is contained in system property boeing.multisso.session_variable_name, from the current user's session.</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>boolean</code> : Value from a client data property in current user's session.
<h4 id="-getuservalue-"><code>getUserValue()</code></h4>
  Gets a true/false value from the current user's User record field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD).</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>boolean</code> : Value from the current user's User record.
<h4 id="-initialize-"><code>initialize()</code></h4>
  Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.</li></ul>
<h4 id="-ipaddressisonben-"><code>ipAddressIsOnBEN()</code></h4>
<p>  Returns true/false based on whether the current user's ip address is on BEN or not</p>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>boolean</code>
<h4 id="-setusersessionvalue-"><code>setUserSessionValue()</code></h4>
  Sets a true/false client data property (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_SESSION_VARIABLE) in the current user's session based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.</li></ul>
<h4 id="-setuservalue-"><code>setUserValue()</code></h4>
<p>  Sets a true/false field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD) on the current user's User record based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.</p>
<h4 id="-_getbencidrranges-"><code>_getBENCIDRRanges()</code></h4>
<p>  Returns an array of BEN ip address ranges</p>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>
<p>   <code>Array</code> : List of ip addresses within BEN. Should be</p>
<p>one of more CIDR ranges.</p>
<h4 id="-_ip4toint-ip-"><code>_ip4ToInt(ip)</code></h4>
<p>  Converts an ip address to an integer.</p>
</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| ip | string | IP address.</p>
<pre><code> <p> | 
</code></pre>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>integer</code>
<h4 id="-_isip4incidr-cidr-"><code>_isIp4InCIDR(cidr)</code></h4>
  Determines if the current user's ip address is within the ip range parameter.</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| cidr | string | IP address range value in CIDR format.</p>
<pre><code> <p> | 
</code></pre>
<p>  <strong>Returns</strong></p>
<ul><li>   <code>boolean</code> : Based on whether current's user's ip address is within ip address range.
<h4 id="-_log-msg-"><code>_log(msg)</code></h4>
  Adds a message to the system log if BoeingBEN.DEBUG is true.</li></ul>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| msg | String | Message to add to the system log. |</p>
<h4 id="-_logerror-msg-"><code>_logError(msg)</code></h4>
<p>  Adds an error message to the system log.</p>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| msg | string | Message to add to system log. |</p>
<h4 id="-_logwarning-msg-"><code>_logWarning(msg)</code></h4>
<p>  Adds a warning message to the system log.</p>
<p>  <strong>Parameters</strong><br />| Name | Type | Description |<br />| --- | --- | --- |<br />| msg | string | Message to add to the system log. |</p>
